issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Create reading benchmarks for 2-level nested data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10120](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10120). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already have benchmarks for reading one-level list and one-level struct. It would be nice to add list-of-list, list-of-struct, struct-of-struct.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10120?focusedCommentId=17208891) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8342
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8342>
